Get Data.description: Returns the GridRowData for the GridRow.

Get Data Get Entity.description: Returns the GridEntity for the GridRowData.

Get Entity Name.description: Returns the logical name for the record in the row.

Get Entity Reference.description: Returns a Lookup value that references the record in the row.

Get Id.description: Returns the Id for the record in the row.

Get Primary Attribute Value.description: Returns the primary attribute value for the record in the row.
